detectors.description:
Reentrancy in PPBC_Ether_Claim.refund_deposits(string) ():
	External calls:
	- ! receiver.send(50000000000000000000) ()
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- deposits_refunded = true ()
	- valid_voucher_code[claimcode] -= 50000000000000000000 ()
detectors.markdown:
Reentrancy in [PPBC_Ether_Claim.refund_deposits(string)]():
	External calls:
	- [! receiver.send(50000000000000000000)]()
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- [deposits_refunded = true]()
	- [valid_voucher_code[claimcode] -= 50000000000000000000]()
